messages.subject: Hi y'all and computer question
messages.msgSnippet: Hi.  I am Millie from near Mobile, AL and have been lurking for a little while.   Hi Millie! Waving at you from over here in Pensacola. I have an inclusive
messages.messageBody:
"Hi. I am Millie from near Mobile, AL and have been lurking for a little while. "

Hi Millie! Waving at you from over here in Pensacola. I have an inclusive support group over here if you ever get a chance to come this way. There are several unschooling families in the group.

You can find us at pensacolaunschoolers.com, and if you scroll down to the bottom of the page, you're welcome to join our email list on Yahoogroups.

Also, you're close enough that you have NO excuse to miss the Live and Learn conference next October. :)

Ren


Learn about unschooling at:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingbasics/
